title: VIDEO: Angry shouting woman in kebab shop gets mild dose of karma
content:
This woman was very angry about green peppers. And she wanted the staff at the kebab place to know how she felt. Loudly. With insults. 

You see, her kids only eat red peppers and the staff mistakenly used green ones in her children’s meal. 
 
Now we don’t know the full story here and maybe the woman was having a bad day but her reaction seems a little excessive. 
 
After giving out about the fact the staff weren’t speaking to each other in English, the woman just gets angrier and angrier. 
 
When they try to explain that they can make a new one which will be ready in 15 minutes, she yells that she can’t wait that long: 
 
"15 minutes? I don’t have 15 minutes for you not to know English, not to get it right the first time. You get it right the first time, the customer is always right. 
 
"This is America and you get it right the first time." 
 
[embedded content] 
 
She then storms out but her exit is less than smooth. 
 
We guess karma really is a b*tch.
